title: Give A Little Love and a Little Shade but NOT Coronavirus
description:
Lala and Randall are safe at home in Los Angeles practicing self-isolation amidst the coronavirus outbreak, but check in to bring news of their postponed wedding and Randall's movie production shutdown. Lala also throws a little shade at the Vanderpump Rules newbies,  while Randall clears up what really happened behind the scenes at Jax and Brittany's wedding. Plus, they answer more of your voicemails!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
